meta.name: Angus Ashworth: Yorkshire Heritage Hero
meta.description: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshire's big country houses in a bid to help save and protect some of the country's most incredible houses.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth is heading to some of Yorkshire's big country houses in a bid to help save and protect these northern gems for the future.

videos.title: Newburgh Priory
videos.overview: Angus Ashworth helps preserve historic Newburgh Priory, which has Oliver Cromwell's body buried in the attic - and serious maintenance problems.
